## PermitRequestMessage type

EIP-2612 token permit message for gasless transaction

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type PermitRequestMessage = {
    to: string;
    owner: string;
    spender: string;
    value: number | string;
    nonce: number | string;
    deadline: number | string;
    v: number;
    r: string;
    s: string;
};
```
